company.name: C&W Business
company.description:
C&W Business is part of Liberty Latin America a leading telecommunications company operating in over 20 consumer markets and over 30 B2B markets; operating the largest award-winning state-of-the-art subsea multi-ring fiber-optic network connecting 40 countries.  C&W Business solutions and services include enterprise-grade connectivity, award-winning data centers, hosting and managed solutions, as well as information technology solutions with customers ranging from small and medium enterprises to international companies and governmental agencies. 

C&W Business solutions are backed by a Fiber Optic Network owned and operated by C&W, which spans more than 50,000 km of subsea fiber, over 60 sub-sea cable stations and 38,000 kilometers of terrestrial fiber and is the Largest Network in the Pan Caribbean region.  A network designed with enough capacity and durability to meet all the needs of the region into 2035 and beyond. 

We also own and operates six (6) state-of-the-art regional data centers in Bogota (2), Panama, Miami, Cayman and Curacao with a minimum uptime of Tier III to a Tier IV.  More so, our Disaster Recovery as a Service platform has been recognized for three (3) consecutive years in the Gartner Magic Quadrant.

Our team of experts strive to provide flexible and scalable IT solutions that go beyond usually prescribed services while minimizing risk and helping reduce downtime for any size of customer.  Our bilingual, fully trained team of certified professionals within our Customer Support, Network Operations and Security Operating Centers are available 24x7x365 to assist you.
